maneuver.title: Maneuver: {maneuver}
maneuver.accuracy.hint: The effect this Maneuver has on Accuracy for the round.
maneuver.initiative.hint: The effect this Maneuver has on Initiative for the round.
maneuver.defense.hint: The effect this Maneuver has on Defense rolls for the round.
maneuver.parry.hint: The effect this Maneuver has on Parry rolls for the round.
maneuver.damage.hint: The effect this Maneuver has on Damage rolls for the round.
maneuver.complexity.hint: The Complexity requirement to use this Maneuver

allowedTypes.hint: The combat Skill categories that can be used with this Maneuver
allowedTypes.cavalry: Can be used with the Riding Skill
allowedTypes.defense: Can be used with the Defense Skill
allowedTypes.handtohand: Can be used with the Hand-to-Hand Skill
allowedTypes.melee: Can be used with the Melee Skill
allowedTypes.ranged: Can be used with Skills associated with ranged attacks

maneuver.skill.hint: The Skill to which this Maneuver applies
maneuver.fromCpx.hint: Whether this Maneuver is granted due to a Skill's Complexity.
maneuver.granted.hint: Whether or not this Maneuver was granted for free by the Weaver
maneuver.points.hint: The type of points used to pay for the Maneuver.

skill.title: Skill: {skill}
skill.name.hint: The top-level name of the Skill, without specifiers
skill.specific.hint: The specific area of expertise to which this Skill pertains, if appropriate
skill.specify.hint: Whether this Skill require an area of expertise to be specified
skill.specialization.hint: A Specialization that pertains to this Skill

combatCategory.hint: The combat categories this Skill applies to
combatCategory.cavalry-hint: This Skill is marked as a Riding Combat Skill
combatCategory.defense-hint: This Skill is marked as a Defense Combat Skill
combatCategory.handtohand-hint: This Skill is marked as a Hand-to-Hand Combat Skill
combatCategory.melee-hint: This Skill is marked as a Melee Combat Skill
combatCategory.ranged-hint: This Skill is marked as a Ranged Combat Skill

points.level.cp.hint: The number of CP invested into increasing this Skill's starting Level
points.level.xp.hint: The number of XP invested into increasing this Skill's Level
points.cpx.cp.hint: The number of CP invested into increasing this Skill's starting Complexity
points.cpx.xp.hint: The number of XP invested into increasing this Skill's Complexity
points.edie.fromBonus.hint: Number of non-XP e-die spent into this Skill's rolls
points.edie.fromXP.hint: Number of XP converted to e-die for this Skill's rolls

name.hint: The name of this piece of Gear

qty.hint: The quantity of this Gear possessed

weight.hint: The Weight for one unit of this Gear

value.hint: The Value of one unit of this Gear

valueThreshold.hint: The Threshold required to find this type of Item

complexity.hint: The Complexity requirement to use, or fully use, this Gear

storage.hint: Another piece of Gear on or in which this Gear belongs

carried.hint: Whether or not this Gear is carried by/worn on the Character who possesses it

totalWeight.full: Total Weight (kg) of this Gear and any contents

category.hint: The general category this Weapon belongs to

subcategory.hint: The specific category this Weapon belongs to, within its general category

accuracy.hint: The Accuracy modifier of this Weapon

parry.hint: The Parry modifier of this Weapon

fumble.hint: The Fumble Risk of this Weapon

damage.hint: The Damage Multiplier formula for this Weapon, generally a flat number, AD+X, or AD+X/Y

traits.hint: Any special traits this Weapon has (e.g. ENT, MNT, 2H)

ranges.hint: The range type(s) at which this Weapon can be used

baseRange.hint: The first range band of this Weapon, generally a flat number or STR+X

rof.hint: The Rate Of Fire for this Weapon, generally a flat number or X/Y

ammo.current.hint: The current amount of ammo loaded into this Weapon
ammo.capacity.hint: The ammo capacity of this Weapon before it needs to be reloaded

armor.ar.hint: The AR of this (piece of) Armor
armor.conceal.hint: The degree to which this Armor can be concealed
armor.enc.hint: The whole number Encumbrance value of this (piece of) Armor
armor.notes.hint: Notes relevant to this Armor, such as penalties to Notice or Stealth
armor.partial.hint: This piece of Armor does not have an individual ENC, but three such pieces equal 1 ENC

errors.circular-container: An Item cannot be made its own container
errors.quantity-on-container: A container Item cannot have a quantity other than 1
errors.unowned-specialization: Specializations cannot be created outside of a Skill that belongs to a character.
errors.existing-skill-specialization: A Specialization with that name already exists for this Skill
errors.weapon-no-range: Weapons must have at least one Range selected
